description: Building and maintaining interactive casino and slot games using Phaser.js and Pixi.js. Implementing spin handling, paylines, bonus rounds, and integrating real-time betting logic and leaderboards.
Developed advanced TicTacToe variants (5x5, Pyramid, Ultimate 9x9) and Ludo in Cocos Creator 3, including multiplayer, leaderboards, reward-based ads, and localization for a global audience.
Worked on WPT Global Poker using Cocos Creator, focusing on gameplay systems, UI/UX, cross-platform optimization, and localization for Japanese and Korean markets.
Designed and developed hyper-casual games using Cocos Creator, Phaser 3, and Construct 2. Also reskinned existing games by updating graphics, UI, and gameplay feel.
Founding member of the Xplore team, integrating lightweight HTML5 games into the BYJU’s app. Prototyped with Unity, Cocos Creator, and Phaser, and built internal templates to streamline development.
Developed casino web games like Triple Chance, Rummy, and Andar Bahar using Phaser 3 and Pixi.js, working with secure real-money flows and mentoring junior developers.
Built HTML5 educational games using JavaScript, jQuery, Canvas, and Phaser 2, including interactive Math and Science learning games for kids.
